title: NYC Apartments for Rent
description:
NYC Apartments
Finding an apartment in New York requires an app built just for the NYC rental market. Naked Apartments®, NYC's largest rentals-only app/website, specializes in all five boroughs: Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, The Bronx and Staten Island.
No Fee Apartments
To avoid brokers fees, consider searching no-fee apartments. With thousands of landlord listings, you’ll have plenty to choose from. Exclusive and by-owner listings show the full address and street.
Testimonials
Here’s what people are saying about us:
“Say goodbye to Craigslist forever. This is the easiest way to find an apartment.”
“The most trustworthy internet apartment search site.”
Download our Android app today and find out how easy, quick the hunt can be!
Please email comments, suggestions or problems to info@nakedapartments.com.
